typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string (''),
	adf_name as string ('')
}
source(output(
		row as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> ADFCONTROL
ADFCONTROL derive(ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id,
		ADF_TIME_STMP = toTimestamp(toString(currentDate()-1)+"23:59:59") ,
		ADF_JOB_NAME = $adf_name) ~> AddADFDetails
AddADFDetails alterRow(updateIf(ADF_JOB_NAME==$adf_name)) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(input(
		ADF_RUN_ID as string,
		ADF_JOB_NAME as string,
		ADF_SUC_TS as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['ADF_JOB_NAME'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ADF_RUN_ID,
		ADF_JOB_NAME,
		ADF_SUC_TS = ADF_TIME_STMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Write
